title: tiru uLLam irangAdhA
sahitya:
tiruvuLLam irangAdA! shrI shabari

girIsha gurunAthA undan  

anupallavi  

karuNai mazhai pozhiyum kaliyuga varadA

taruNamaRindaruLum dayAnidhE undan  

caraNam  

puvimIdu piRrandadum un puNNiya mahimai solla

kavipAdik kanindiDum en nenjam negizhum mella

AviyaganRiDum nAL varaiyil endan

nAvil amarndu un pugazh pADa aruL seyya  

madhyama kAlam

nirandaram unadu padam tarum punida

nilai ninaindE urugi ninREn

arum tavam Endi amarndaruL puriyum

harihara hamsAnanda swarUpa nin
